name: rag_agent_1.yml
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage Artificial Intelligence (AI) assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun  
  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Create an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - name: Update an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        agent_name: "Lorenzo8 Livigni8"
        method: UPDATE
      register: update_result

    - name: Display the output of Create an AI assistant agen
      debug:
        var: update_result.json_payload

    - name: Get an AI assistant agen by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the agent info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - name: Delete an AI assistant agen by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        rag_agent_id: "{{create_result.json_payload.id}}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

    - name: Display the delete agent result
      debug:
        var: delete_result.json_payload

name: rag_document_1.yml
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_username_api: fabrice.livigni@free.fr
      rag_password_api: password
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun

  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload


    - name: Embed a document in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of the document ingestion
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost


    - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: "clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2"
        rag_document_id: "{{ create_result.json_payload.id }}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

    - name: Display the delete document result
      debug:
        var: delete_result.json_payload

name: rag_document_defaults.yml
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Sample RAG Ansible playbooks to manage RAG Documents
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: False
  vars_files:
    - my_module_defaults.yml
    
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document: "{{ my_module_defaults }}"

  tasks:

    - name: Get a list of RAG documents
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get a RAG document by its ID
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload

    - name: Create a RAG document
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

options.name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework

yaml_lines:
- name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: "clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3"
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

name: Display the list of RAG agents

annotations.module.examples:
- name: Print the gateway for each host when defined
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg: System {{ inventory_hostname }} has gateway {{ ansible_default_ipv4.gateway }}
  when: ansible_default_ipv4.gateway is defined

- name: Get uptime information
  ansible.builtin.shell: /usr/bin/uptime
  register: result

- name: Print return information from the previous task
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    var: result
    verbosity: 2

- name: Display all variables/facts known for a host
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    var: hostvars[inventory_hostname]
    verbosity: 4

- name: Prints two lines of messages, but only if there is an environment value set
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg:
    - "Provisioning based on YOUR_KEY which is: {{ lookup('ansible.builtin.env', 'YOUR_KEY') }}"
    - "These servers were built using the password of '{{ password_used }}'. Please retain this for later use."

options.name: Display the list of RAG agents

yaml_lines:
- name: Display the list of RAG agents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

options.name: Create an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework

yaml_lines:

      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
        rag_workspace_id: clxt68sy6000277c1q434saj3
        agent_name: Lorenzo13 Charenton13
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent

name: rag_document_4.yml
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_username_api: fabrice.livigni@free.fr
      rag_password_api: password
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun

  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID  into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload


    - name: Transfer or Submit a document into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of the document ingestion
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost


    - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: "clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2"
        rag_document_id: "{{ create_result.json_payload.id }}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

    - name: Display the delete document result
      debug:
        var: delete_result.json_payload

Display the list of RAG documents
Get or Retrieve a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
Transfer or Submit a document in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
Display the output of the document ingestion
Remove or Delete a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup

yaml_lines:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
  gather_facts: False
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: https://rag-turbo-app-rag-turbo.apps.wxai-ocp-ga.p126.cesc.nca.ihost.com/api
      rag_username_api: fabrice.livigni@free.fr
      rag_password_api: password
      rag_api_key: sk_wrk_2MRLdOtcHpgadUefAIuW2o1l2qXZ3Qkscynkd4eXxOs9OZun

  tasks:


    - name: Get a list of documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        method: LIST
      register: get_result

    - name: Display the list of RAG documents
      debug:
        var: get_result.json_payload

    - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_document_id: "{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}"
        method: GET_BY_ID
      register: get_by_id_result

    - name: Display the RAG document info
      debug:
        var: get_by_id_result.json_payload


    - name: Transfer or Submit a document in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2
        rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
        rag_chunk_overlap: 150
        rag_chunk_size: 400
        rag_keep_files: false
        method: CREATE
      register: create_result

    - name: Display the output of the document ingestion
      debug:
        var: create_result.json_payload

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost


    - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) setup
      ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
        rag_agent_id: "clxt6tle8000777c1ssbpf9b2"
        rag_document_id: "{{ create_result.json_payload.id }}"
        method: DELETE
      register: delete_result

    - name: Display the delete document result
      debug:
        var: delete_result.json_payload
